tika-vin09t9:1_0: Abhilāpamattamevāti ettha daharavasena “bhante”ti ca vuḍḍhavasena “āvuso”ti ca tattha duvidho abhilāpo,
tika-vin09t9:2_0: Kāyasaṁsagge vuttanayenāti ettha tabbahulanayena kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā vuttā.
tika-vin09t9:2_1: “Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajjeyyā”ti avatvā pana “sādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā akiriyatopi samuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṁ.
tika-vin09t9:2_3: evaṁ heṭṭhā “manussitthiyā tayo magge methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevantassa āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena
tika-vin09t9:2_4: kiriyasamuṭṭhānataṁ vatvā tadanantaraṁ “bhikkhupaccatthikā manussitthiṁ bhikkhussa santikaṁ ānetvā vaccamaggena
tika-vin09t9:2_6: so ce pavesanaṁ sādiyatī”tiādinā nayena akiriyasamuṭṭhānassapi vuttattā paṭhamapārājikāyapi tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā veditabbā.
tika-vin09t9:3_0: Aṅgajātacalanañcettha na sārato daṭṭhabbaṁ “so ce pavesanaṁ na sādiyati,
tika-vin09t9:3_4: āpatti pārājikassā”ti ettha ṭhitanasādiyane pakatiyāpi paripuṇṇacalanattā.
tika-vin09t9:3_5: Sādiyanapaccayā paṭisevanacalanañcettha na dissatevāti tabbahulanayeneva kiriyasamuṭṭhānatā gahetabbā.
tika-vin09t9:4_0: Apica bhikkhuniyāpi paṭhamapārājike tassa sādiyanassa sarūpena vuttattā tadanurūpavasena vibhaṅganayamanoloketvā “kiriyasamuṭṭhāna”micceva vuttaṁ.
tika-vin09t9:4_5: sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjapaṇṇattivajjānaṁ niyamalakkhaṇasiddhi hoti,
tika-vin09t9:4_6: tathā taṁ avatvā “yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṁ akusalameva hoti,
tika-vin09t9:4_8: sesā paṇṇattivajjā”ti vutte lokavajjavacanaṁ niratthakaṁ siyā vatthuajānanapakkhepi akusaleneva pātabbattā.
tika-vin09t9:4_10: tasmā khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṁ “majjapāne pana bhikkhuno ajānitvāpi bījato paṭṭhāya majjaṁ pivantassa pācittiyaṁ.
tika-vin09t9:4_13: na vuttaṁ “vatthuajānanapakkhe pāṇātipātādīnaṁ siddhikaraakusalacittuppādasadise cittuppāde satipi sāmaṇero sīlabhedaṁ nāpajjatī”ti.
tika-vin09t9:4_15: “Surāmerayime”ti vatthuṁ jānitvā pātabbatādivasena vītikkamantassa akusalassa asambhavo natthi.
tika-vin09t9:5_1: yuttivacanena arahantānaṁ appavisanato sacittakācittakapakkhesu akusalaniyamoti ce? Na,
tika-vin09t9:5_3: Acittakapakkhe akusalaniyamābhāvadassanatthaṁ supantassa mukhe pakkhittajalabindumiva surābinduādayo udāharitabbā.
tika-vin09t9:5_4: Tabbahulanayena hi atthe gahite pubbenāparaṁ aṭṭhakathāya sameti saddhiṁ pāḷiyā cāti.
tika-vin09t9:5_9: Ettha bhikkhussa ca bhikkhuniyā ca kāyasaṁsaggabhāve sati bhikkhunī kāyaṅgaṁ acopayamānāpi citteneva adhivāseti, āpajjati,
tika-vin09t9:5_12: evameva paṭhamapārājikepi copane sati eva āpajjati, nāsati.
tika-vin09t9:5_16: Evaṁ santepi vīmaṁsitvā gahetabbanti vadantīti likhitaṁ
